title: What is the difference with the versions of the new album Mots: 7 and also other BTS albums in general? - Quora

response.answer_text: The only different with Album versions is the Album coverings and photocards. Alot of group in K-Pop have several different versions of there album so that it can appeal to everyone in there fandom. Same goes for BTS’s albums, some even link together and are fun for album collectors. Example:
